title: Poster, "Citicorp Center, Citicorp Real Estate Project", 1975
title_raw: Citicorp Center, Citicorp Real Estate Project
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
In black upper left corner: CALL CITICORP / Real Estate / Management / For Rental / Information / 559-8616 / 55604741 / Or Call Your / Own Broker.
In white lower left corner: In the retail shopping area located in / Citicorp Center's low-rise building, you will find food and drink from all over the / world. Restaurants and cafes, each with / a different menu, will offer taste treats of / all kinds. / And should you wish to dupli-/ cate any of their dishes, everything you / need - ingredients, cookbooks, cooking / equipment, fish, fowl or meat - will be / available at adjacent shops. To sample in / elegant surroundings or to purchase for / your own kitchen, the earth's bounty is / yours at this unique international market / in Citicorp Center.
description: On a vibrant orange background a photographic reproduction of an elaborate array of food and drink: Among the various offerings are fruit, sushi and spare ribs. Asparagus and bread are shown with wine and beer in an overall overhead shot. The title in white, CITICORP / CENTER, is at upper right corner. There is a stylized white edging at upper right and lower left. At left center there is a large orange number six.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Citicorp Center, Citicorp Real Estate Project", 1975. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-126.
